ISSUE.TITLE: i18n Translations
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Hello! NocoDB supports many foreign languages & we welcome community contributions via an easy to use [google-spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1kGp92yLwhs1l7lwwgeor3oN1dFl7JZWuQOa4WSeZ0TE/edit#gid=2076107172). Your help in fixing i18n goes a long way supporting NocoDB. We're looking for contributors to verify / translate our i18n data. ## First time here? Please check out [How to participate in Community](https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/issues/601) first. ## i18n Contribution Guide Please check out [How to contribute for community members](https://docs.nocodb.com/engineering/translation#how-to-contribute--for-community-members).

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: chore: add jsonconfig, remove field option from dhared view Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Add Slovenian translation .json file. Discussion about adding Slovenian started here: https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/issues/633#issuecomment-945002515
